official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for
		  offsetting certain past-due local tax debts against income tax
		  overpayments.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Offsetting past-due, legally
			 enforceable local tax obligations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the
			 end the following new paragraph:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

text.#text:
A State may, on
				behalf of a local government located within the State, submit a notice of
				past-due, legally enforceable local tax obligation for offset under this
				subsection.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, any reduction attributable to a past-due, legally enforceable local tax
				obligation shall be made (in addition to reductions specified in such
				subparagraph) after the overpayment is reduced pursuant to—
with respect to any covered unemployment compensation debt; and

have been met by the local
				government.

text.#text:
the local
				government on whose behalf a State is submitting shall certify to the State
				that the requirements of

Such submission and offset shall be made with respect to
				any past-due, legally enforceable local tax obligation under rules similar to
				the rules of this subsection, except—

continuation-text.#text:
Such
				term shall not include any local income tax described in the second sentence of

text.#text:
which resulted from a
				judgment rendered by a court of competent jurisdiction, or a determination
				after an administrative hearing, which has determined an amount of tax to be
				due to a local government; and

which is no longer subject to judicial
				review; or

which resulted
				from a tax imposed by a local government which has been assessed but not
				collected, the time for redetermination of which has expired, and which has not
				been delinquent for more than 10 years.

header.#text:
Past-due,
				legally enforceable local tax obligation

term.#text:
past-due, legally enforceable local tax
				obligation

text.#text:
For purposes of this
				subsection, the term

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall issue such regulations, and modify any such regulations under

, as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this
				paragraph.

header.#text:
Past-due,
				legally enforceable local tax obligations

text.#text:
The amendments made by this section shall apply to refunds
			 payable after the date of the enactment of this Act.
